fields.summary: [PATCH] unnecessary NullPointerExceptions thrown and caught in org.codehaus.plexus.util.CollectionUtils.getFreq(..)

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.description:
Found that whilst building Geronimo with Maven 1.1-beta2 under a debugger that there were a lot of unnecessary NullPointerExceptions thrown and caught in org.codehaus.plexus.util.CollectionUtils.getFreq(..).

This also made catching NullPointerExceptions elsewhere more difficult as I had to filter these ones out in the debugger.

Attached patch will reduce the number of exceptions generated and caught.

Example stack trace when exceptions thrown/caught.

Thread [main] (Suspended (exception java.lang.NullPointerException))
    org.codehaus.plexus.util.CollectionUtils.getFreq(java.lang.Object, java.util.Map) line: 216
    org.codehaus.plexus.util.CollectionUtils.intersection(java.util.Collection, java.util.Collection) line: 136
    org.apache.maven.MavenUtils.mergeMaps(java.util.Map, java.util.Map) line: 441
    org.apache.maven.MavenUtils.mergeMaps(java.util.Map[]) line: 480
    org.apache.maven.MavenUtils.createContextNoDefaults(java.io.File, org.apache.maven.jelly.MavenJellyContext) line: 584
    org.apache.maven.MavenUtils.createContext(java.io.File, org.apache.maven.jelly.MavenJellyContext) line: 548
    org.apache.maven.MavenUtils.createContext(java.io.File) line: 531
    org.apache.maven.cli.App.initializeRootContext() line: 374
    org.apache.maven.cli.App.initialize(java.lang.String[]) line: 293
    org.apache.maven.cli.App.initializeMain(java.lang.String[]) line: 633
    org.apache.maven.cli.App.doMain(java.lang.String[], java.util.Date) line: 482
    org.apache.maven.cli.App.main(java.lang.String[]) line: 1258
    sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(java.lang.reflect.Method, java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object[]) line: not available [native method]
    sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object[]) line: 39
    sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object[]) line: 25
    java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object[]) line: 324
    com.werken.forehead.Forehead.run(java.lang.String[]) line: 551
    com.werken.forehead.Forehead.main(java.lang.String[]) line: 581

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed
